about_the_game:
Welcome to Drift Survivors, a fast-paced fusion of adrenaline-fueled drifting and chaotic survival combat! Take control of a sleek, high-performance car in a top-down arena where every corner, boost, and shot counts. Fight through relentless waves of enemies, upgrade your ride, and prove you’re the ultimate Drift Survivor.

Features

  • Master the Art of Drifting: Slide through tight turns and outmaneuver your enemies while maintaining control.

  • Unleash Deadly Arsenal: Equip your car with powerful weapons like Homing Rockets, Tron Lines, Ricochet Guns, and Bombardments.

  • Upgrade Your Ride: Boost your car’s speed, armor, and unique abilities to dominate the battlefield.

  • Japanese-Inspired Map: Drift through visually stunning zones featuring sakura blossoms, neon lights, and tight corners.

  • Survive Endless Waves: Face hordes of enemies, from drones to elite bosses, all trying to take you down.

  • Feel the Groove with Custom Phonk Music: Immerse yourself in the game with a killer soundtrack featuring original phonk tracks composed exclusively for Drift Survivors.

Why Play Drift Survivors?

If you’re a fan of games like Vampire Survivors but crave a high-octane racing twist, Drift Survivors delivers the perfect blend of strategy, action, and style. Feel the rush of dodging enemy attacks, pulling off epic drifts, and obliterating foes in your path.

Are You Ready to Survive?

Jump into the driver’s seat and see if you have what it takes to survive the chaos. Drift your way to glory, or crash trying!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or similar AMD
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements could be changed in future.
